title: V/O (Voiceover) Files
body: Whats up guys, so, I like to think that I'm a pretty vivid music producer and I thought it be pretty awesome to make some champion based tracks. That being said, I've wondered if there's a way I could get a hold of / find the V/O of champions.. I'd appreciate any help I can get! :) ty <3

replies.body:
If you go to League wiki, http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/League_of_Legends_Wiki click on a champion and go to 'quotes' it gives you a list of all their in-game voice lines. You can either listen or download them _(it doesn't work on some browsers like safari, I think you need firefox or google chrome)_

You _can_ extract them from the game files as well, but i never recommend mucking around with that.

Hey, dumb question :P How do I save the quotes from the website?

When I try to save the link, its an OGX format
